event.location: Delta Force Paintball East London, 1 Aveley Road, RM14 2TW Upminster, Havering, United Kingdom
event.text:
Join us for Paintball in Aveley Road, Upminster from 4pm on Wednesday 12th June!
Tickets will be Â£10 each and will go live on Sunday 9th June at 1pm. Stay tuned on our Facebook event for more updates on this.
